   22: -module(ssh_sftp_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -export([
   25:          suite/0,
   26:          all/0,
   27:          groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          end_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_testcase/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: -export([
   37:          ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   38:          ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar/1,
   39:          async_read/1,
   40:          async_write/1,
   41:          big_file_to_tar/1,
   42:          binaries_to_tar/1,
   43:          block_size_16_crypto_tar/1,
   44:          block_size_1_crypto_tar/1,
   45:          create_empty_tar/1,
   46:          directory_to_tar/1,
   47:          file_owner_access/1,
   48:          files_chunked_to_tar/1,
   49:          files_to_tar/1,
   50:          links/1,
   51:          mk_rm_dir/1,
   52:          null_crypto_tar/1,
   53:          open_close_dir/1,
   54:          open_close_file/1,
   55:          pos_read/1,
   56:          pos_write/1,
   57:          position/1,
   58:          read_crypto_tar/1,
   59:          read_dir/1,
   60:          read_file/1,
   61:          read_null_crypto_tar/1,
   62:          read_tar/1,
   63:          remove_file/1,
   64:          rename_file/1,
   65:          retrieve_attributes/1,
   66:          set_attributes/1,
   67:          sftp_nonexistent_subsystem/1,
   68:          sftp_read_big_file/1,
   69:          simple_crypto_tar_big/1,
   70:          simple_crypto_tar_small/1,
   71:          start_channel_sock/1,
   72:          stuff/1,
   73:          unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   74:          unstuff/1,
   75:          version_option/1,
   76:          write_big_file/1,
   77:          write_file/1,
   78:          write_file_iolist/1
   79:         ]).
   80: 
   81: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   82: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   83: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   84: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   85: %% Default timetrap timeout
   86: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(1)).
   87: 
   88: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   89: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   90: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   91: 
   92: suite() ->
   93:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   94:      {timetrap,{seconds,40}}].
   95: 
   96: all() -> 
   97:     [{group, not_unicode},
   98:      {group, unicode}
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: 
  102: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  103:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
  104:        begin
  105: 	   ct:log("file:native_name_encoding() = ~p,~nio:getopts() = ~p",
  106: 		  [file:native_name_encoding(),io:getopts()]),
  107: 	   ssh:start(),
  108: 	   Config
  109:        end).
  110: 
  111: end_per_suite(_onfig) ->
  112:     ssh:stop().
  113: 
  114: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: groups() -> 
  116:     [{not_unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  117: 			{group,openssh_server},
  118: 			{group,big_recvpkt_size},
  119: 			sftp_nonexistent_subsystem]},
  120: 
  121:      {unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  122: 		    {group,openssh_server},
  123: 		    sftp_nonexistent_subsystem
  124:                    ]},
  125: 
  126:      {big_recvpkt_size, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  127: 			     {group,openssh_server}]},
  128: 
  129:      {erlang_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  130: 			  version_option,
  131: 			  {group,remote_tar}]},
  132: 
  133:      {openssh_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  134: 			   {group,remote_tar}]},
  135: 
  136:      {remote_tar, [], [create_empty_tar, 
  137: 		       ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  138: 		       ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar,
  139: 		       unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  140: 		       files_to_tar,
  141: 		       big_file_to_tar, files_chunked_to_tar,
  142: 		       directory_to_tar, binaries_to_tar, null_crypto_tar, 
  143: 		       simple_crypto_tar_small, simple_crypto_tar_big,
  144: 		       read_tar, read_null_crypto_tar, read_crypto_tar, 
  145: 		       block_size_1_crypto_tar, block_size_16_crypto_tar
  146: 		      ]},
  147: 
  148:      {write_read_tests, [], [open_close_file, open_close_dir, read_file, read_dir,
  149: 			     write_file, write_file_iolist, write_big_file, sftp_read_big_file,
  150: 			     rename_file, mk_rm_dir, remove_file, links,
  151: 			     retrieve_attributes, set_attributes, file_owner_access, async_read,
  152: 			     async_write, position, pos_read, pos_write,
  153: 			     start_channel_sock
  154: 			    ]}
  155:     ].
  156: 
  157: init_per_group(not_unicode, Config) ->
  158:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  159:     {ok,TestDataDir} =
  160:         make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_not_unicode"),
  161:     [{user, "Alladin"},
  162:      {passwd, "Sesame"},
  163:      {data, <<"Hello world!">>},
  164:      {data_pos, ["Hej ","hopp"]},
  165:      {filename,     "sftp.txt"},
  166:      {testfile,     "test.txt"},
  167:      {linktest,     "link_test.txt"},
  168:      {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test.tar"},
  169:      {tar_F1_txt,   "f1.txt"},
  170:      {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  171:      | Config];
  172: 
  173: init_per_group(unicode, Config) ->
  174:     case have_unicode_support() of
  175: 	true ->
  176: 	    ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  177:             {ok,TestDataDir} =
  178:                 make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_高兴_unicöde"),
  179:             populate_non_unicode(TestDataDir),
  180: 	    NewConfig =
  181: 		[{user, "åke高兴"},
  182: 		 {passwd, "ärlig日本じん"},
  183:                  {data, "foobar å 一二三四いちにさんち"},
  184:                  {data_pos, ["中","国"]},
  185: 		 {filename,     "sftp瑞点.txt"},
  186: 		 {testfile,     "testハンス.txt"},
  187: 		 {linktest,     "link_test語.txt"},
  188: 		 {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test一二三.tar"},
  189: 		 {tar_F1_txt,   "F一.txt"},
  190: 		 {tar_F3_txt,   "f3.txt"},
  191: 		 {tar_F4_txt,   "g四.txt"},
  192: 		 {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  193: 		 | Config %% lists:foldl(fun(K,Cf) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,Cf) end,
  194: 			  %%      Config,
  195: 			  %%      [user, passwd, data,
  196: 			  %%       filename, testfile, linktest,
  197: 			  %%       tar_filename, tar_F1_txt, datadir_tar
  198: 			  %%      ]
  199:                           %%     )
  200: 		],
  201: 	    FN = fn(proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt,NewConfig), NewConfig),
  202: 	    case catch file:read_file(FN) of
  203: 		{ok,FN_contents} ->
  204: 		    ct:log("Readable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~tp",[FN,FN_contents]),
  205: 		    NewConfig;
  206: 		Other ->
  207: 		    ct:log("Unreadable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~p",[FN,Other]),
  208: 		    {skip, "Not unicode file reading"}
  209: 	    end;
  210: 
  211: 	_ ->
  212: 	    {skip, "Not unicode file encoding"}
  213:     end;
  214: 
  215: init_per_group(big_recvpkt_size, Config) ->
  216:     [{pkt_sz,123456} | Config];
  217: 
  218: init_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  219:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  220:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  221:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  222:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  223:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  224:     Sftpd = {_, HostX, PortX} =
  225: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  226: 			     {user_dir, PrivDir},
  227: 			     {user_passwords,
  228: 			      [{User, Passwd}]}]),
  229:     [{peer, {fmt_host(HostX),PortX}}, {group, erlang_server}, {sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  230: 
  231: init_per_group(openssh_server, Config) ->
  232:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  233:     Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
  234:     case (catch ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host,
  235: 				       [{user_interaction, false},
  236: 					{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  237:                                         {save_accepted_host, false}
  238:                                        ])) of
  239: 	{ok, _ChannelPid, Connection} ->
  240: 	    [{peer, {_HostName,{IPx,Portx}}}] = ssh:connection_info(Connection,[peer]),
  241: 	    ssh:close(Connection),
  242: 	    [{w2l, fun w2l/1},
  243:              {peer, {fmt_host(IPx),Portx}}, {group, openssh_server} | Config];
  244: 	{error,"Key exchange failed"} ->
  245: 	    {skip, "openssh server doesn't support the tested kex algorithm"};
  246: 	Other ->
  247:             ct:log("No openssh server. Cause:~n~p~n",[Other]),
  248: 	    {skip, "No openssh daemon (see log in testcase)"} 
  249:     end;
  250: 
  251: init_per_group(remote_tar, Config) ->
  252:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  253:     {Host,Port} =  proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  254:     ct:log("Server (~p) at ~p:~p",[proplists:get_value(group,Config),Host,Port]),
  255:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  256:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  257:     Connection =
  258: 	case proplists:get_value(group, Config) of
  259: 	    erlang_server ->
  260: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  261: 			    [{user, User},
  262: 			     {password, Passwd},
  263: 			     {user_interaction, false},
  264: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}]);
  265: 	    openssh_server ->
  266: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  267: 			    [{user_interaction, false},
  268: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}])
  269: 	end,
  270:     [{remote_tar, true}, 
  271:      {connection, Connection} | Config];
  272: 
  273: init_per_group(write_read_tests, Config) ->
  274:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  275:     Config.
  276: 
  277: grps(Config) ->
  278:     proplists:get_all_values(
  279:       name, 
  280:       lists:flatten([proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[]),
  281: 		     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])])).
  282: 
  283: end_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  284:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  285:     Config;
  286: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  287:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  288:     Config.
  289: 
  290: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  291: 
  292: init_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  293:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  294:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  295:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  296:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  297:     Sftpd = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  298: 				 {user_dir, PrivDir},
  299: 				 {subsystems, []},
  300: 				 {user_passwords,
  301: 				  [{User, Passwd}]}
  302: 				]),
  303:     [{sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  304: 
  305: init_per_testcase(version_option, Config0) ->
  306:     Config = prepare(Config0),
  307:     TmpConfig0 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config),
  308:     TmpConfig = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, TmpConfig0),
  309:     Dog = ct:timetrap(?default_timeout),
  310:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  311:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  312:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  313:     {ok, ChannelPid, Connection}  = 
  314: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  315: 			       [{sftp_vsn, 3},
  316: 				{user, User},
  317: 				{password, Passwd},
  318: 				{user_interaction, false},
  319: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  320:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  321:                                ]),
  322:     Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  323:     [{sftp,Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | TmpConfig];
  324: 
  325: init_per_testcase(Case, Config00) ->
  326:     Config0 = prepare(Config00),
  327:     Config1 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config0),
  328:     Config2 = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, Config1),
  329:     Dog = ct:timetrap(2 * ?default_timeout),
  330:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config0),
  331:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config0),
  332:     PktSzOpt = case proplists:get_value(pkt_sz, Config0) of
  333: 		   undefined -> [];
  334: 		   Sz -> [{packet_size,Sz}]
  335: 	       end,
  336:     Config =
  337: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config2) of
  338: 	    erlang_server ->
  339: 		{_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config2),
  340: 		{ok, ChannelPid, Connection}  = 
  341: 		    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  342: 					   [{user, User},
  343: 					    {password, Passwd},
  344: 					    {user_interaction, false},
  345: 					    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  346:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  347: 					    | PktSzOpt
  348: 					   ]
  349: 					  ),
  350: 		Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  351: 		[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2];
  352: 	    openssh_server when Case == links ->
  353: 		{skip, "known bug in openssh"};
  354: 	    openssh_server ->
  355: 		Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
  356: 		{ok, ChannelPid, Connection} = 
  357: 		    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, 
  358: 					   [{user_interaction, false},
  359: 					    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  360:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  361: 					    | PktSzOpt
  362: 					   ]),
  363: 		Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  364: 		[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2]
  365: 	end,
  366: 
  367:     case catch proplists:get_value(remote_tar,Config) of
  368: 	%% The 'catch' is for the case of Config={skip,...}
  369: 	true ->
  370: 	    %% Provide a ChannelPid independent of the sftp-channel already opened.
  371: 	    {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(proplists:get_value(connection,Config)),
  372: 	    [{channel_pid2,ChPid2} | Config];
  373: 	_ ->
  374: 	    Config
  375:     end.
  376: 
  377: end_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  378:     Config;
  379: end_per_testcase(rename_file, Config) ->
  380:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  381:     file:delete(NewFileName),  
  382:     end_per_testcase(Config);
  383: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  384:     end_per_testcase(Config).
  385: 
  386: end_per_testcase(Config) ->
  387:     {Sftp, Connection} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  388:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Sftp),
  389:     catch ssh_sftp:stop_channel(proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config)),
  390:     ok = ssh:close(Connection).
  391: 
  392: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  393: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  394: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  395: open_close_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  396:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  397:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  398:     ct:log("FileName     = ~p~nSftpFileName = ~p", [FileName, SftpFileName]),
  399:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  400: 
  401:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  402:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  403:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, creat]),
  404:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, trunc]),
  405:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [append]),
  406:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read, binary]).
  407: 
  408: open_close_file(Server, File, Mode) ->
  409:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Server, File, Mode),
  410:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Server, Handle).
  411: 
  412: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  413: open_close_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  414:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  415:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  416:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  417:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  418:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  419: 
  420:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  421:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Sftp, Handle),
  422:     {error, _} =  ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  423: 
  424: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  425: read_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  426:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  427:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  428:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  429:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  430:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  431:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(FileName).
  432: 
  433: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  434: read_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  435:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  436:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  437: 
  438:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  439:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  440:     ct:log("sftp list dir: ~p~n", [Files]).
  441: 
  442: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  443: write_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  444:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  445:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  446:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  447:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  448:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  449:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  450:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  451: 
  452: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  453: write_file_iolist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  454:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  455:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  456:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  457: 
  458:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  459:     DataB = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  460:     lists:foreach(
  461:       fun(D) ->
  462: 	      ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [D]),
  463: 	      Expected = try iolist_to_binary(D)
  464:                          catch _:_ -> unicode:characters_to_binary(D)
  465: 			 end,
  466: 	      {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName)
  467:       end,
  468:       [Data, [Data,Data], [[Data],[Data]], [[[Data]],[[[[Data]],Data]]],
  469:        [[[[Data]],Data],DataB],
  470:        [[[[Data]],Data],[[DataB],[[DataB]]]]
  471:       ]).
  472: 
  473: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  474: write_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  475:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  476:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  477:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  478: 
  479:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  480:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  481:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  482:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  483:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  484: 
  485: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  486: sftp_read_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  487:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  488:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  489:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  490: 
  491:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  492:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  493:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  494:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  495:     {ok, Expected} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  496: 
  497: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  498: remove_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  499:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  500:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  501:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  502:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  503:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  504: 
  505:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  506:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  507:     ok = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  508:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  509:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  510:     {error, no_such_file} = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  511: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  512: rename_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  513:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  514:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  515:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  516:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  517:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  518:     SftpNewFileName = w2l(Config, NewFileName),
  519: 
  520:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  521:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  522:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, Files]),
  523:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  524:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), Files),
  525:     ok = ssh_sftp:rename(Sftp, SftpFileName, SftpNewFileName),
  526:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  527:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, NewFiles]),
  528: 
  529:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  530:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), NewFiles).
  531: 
  532: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  533: mk_rm_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  534:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  535:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  536:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  537: 
  538:     DirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "test"),
  539:     SftpDirName = w2l(Config, DirName),
  540:     ok = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  541:     ok = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  542:     NewDirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "foo/bar"),
  543:     SftpNewDirName = w2l(Config, NewDirName),
  544:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpNewDirName),
  545:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir).
  546: 
  547: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  548: links(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  549:     case os:type() of
  550: 	{win32, _} ->
  551: 	    {skip, "Links are not fully supported by windows"};
  552: 	_ ->
  553: 	    {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  554: 	    FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  555:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  556: 	    LinkFileName = proplists:get_value(linktest, Config),
  557:             SftpLinkFileName = w2l(Config, LinkFileName),
  558: 
  559: 	    ok = ssh_sftp:make_symlink(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName, SftpFileName),
  560: 	    {ok, FileName} = ssh_sftp:read_link(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName)
  561:     end.
  562: 
  563: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  564: retrieve_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  565:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  566:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  567:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  568:     {ok, FileInfo} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  569:     {ok, NewFileInfo} = file:read_file_info(FileName),
  570:     ct:log("SFTP: ~p   FILE: ~p~n", [FileInfo, NewFileInfo]),
  571:     ?assertEqual(NewFileInfo#file_info.uid, FileInfo#file_info.uid),
  572:     ?assertEqual(NewFileInfo#file_info.gid, FileInfo#file_info.gid),
  573:     ok.
  574: 
  575: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  576: set_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  577:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  578:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  579:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  580:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(FileName, write),
  581:     io:put_chars(Fd,"foo"),
  582:     TestWriting =
  583:         fun(FInfo) ->
  584:                 ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName,
  585:                                               FInfo#file_info{mode=8#400}),
  586:                 {error, eacces} = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again"),
  587:                 ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName,
  588:                                               FInfo#file_info{mode=8#600}),
  589:                 ok = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again")
  590:         end,
  591:     TestWriting(#file_info{}),
  592:     IsErlangServer =
  593:         fun() ->
  594:                 TcGroupPath = proplists:get_value(tc_group_path, Config),
  595:                 {_, Path} = lists:unzip(lists:flatten(TcGroupPath)),
  596:                 lists:member(erlang_server, Path)
  597:         end,
  598:     case IsErlangServer() of
  599:         true ->
  600:             ct:log("Testing with writing a complete #file_info record"),
  601:             {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(SftpFileName),
  602:             TestWriting(FileInfo);
  603:         _ ->
  604:             %% with OpenSSH daemon started by other user above instruction end
  605:             %% up with permission denied
  606:             ok
  607:     end,
  608:     ok.
  609: 
  610: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  611: file_owner_access(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  612:     case os:type() of
  613:         {win32, _} ->
  614:             {skip, "Not a relevant test on Windows"};
  615:         _ ->
  616:             FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  617:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  618:             {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  619: 
  620:             {ok, #file_info{mode = InitialMode}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, FileName),
  621: 
  622:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#000}),
  623:             {ok, #file_info{access = none}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  624: 
  625:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#400}),
  626:             {ok, #file_info{access = read}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  627: 
  628:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#200}),
  629:             {ok, #file_info{access = write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  630: 
  631:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#600}),
  632:             {ok, #file_info{access = read_write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  633: 
  634:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=InitialMode}),
  635: 
  636:             ok
  637:     end.
  638: 
  639: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  640: async_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  641:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  642: 
  643:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  644:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  645:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  646:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:aread(Sftp, Handle, 20),
  647: 
  648:     receive
  649: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok, Data}} ->
  650: 	    ct:log("Data: ~p~n", [Data]),
  651: 	    ok;
  652: 	Msg ->
  653: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  654:     after 
  655: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  656:     end.
  657: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  658: async_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  659:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  660:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  661:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  662:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  663:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  664:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  665:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:awrite(Sftp, Handle, Data),
  666: 
  667:     receive
  668: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  669: 	    {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName);
  670: 	Msg ->
  671: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  672:     end.
  673: 
  674: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  675: position(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  676:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  677:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  678:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  679: 
  680:     Data = list_to_binary("1234567890"),
  681:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  682:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  683: 
  684:     {ok, 3} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 3}),
  685:     {ok, "4"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  686: 
  687:     {ok, 10} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, eof),
  688:     eof = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  689: 
  690:     {ok, 6} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 6}),
  691:     {ok, "7"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  692: 
  693:     {ok, 9} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {cur, 2}),
  694:     {ok, "0"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  695: 
  696:     {ok, 0} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, bof),
  697:     {ok, "1"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  698: 
  699:     {ok, 1} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, cur),
  700:     {ok, "2"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1).
  701: 
  702: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  703: pos_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  704:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  705:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  706:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  707:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_pos, Config),
  708:     [Expect1,Expect2] = Es = [binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(D)) || D <- Data],
  709:     [Len1,Len2] = [length(E) || E <- Es],
  710:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  711: 
  712:     {ok,Read} = file:read_file(FileName),
  713:     ct:log("File: <~ts>~n<~p>~nExpect1: <~p>~nExpect2: <~p>", [Read, Read, Expect1, Expect2]),
  714: 
  715:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  716:     {async,Ref} = ssh_sftp:apread(Sftp, Handle, {bof, Len1}, Len2),
  717: 
  718:     receive
  719: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok,Expect2}} ->
  720: 	    ok;
  721: 	Msg ->
  722: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  723:     after 
  724: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  725:     end,
  726: 
  727:    {ok,Expect1} = ssh_sftp:pread(Sftp, Handle, {bof,0}, Len1).
  728: 
  729: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  730: pos_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  731:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  732:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  733:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  734: 
  735:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  736: 
  737:     Data = list_to_binary("Bye,"),
  738:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  739: 
  740:     NewData = list_to_binary(" see you tomorrow"),
  741:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:apwrite(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 4}, NewData),
  742:     receive
  743: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  744: 	    ok;
  745: 	Msg ->
  746: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  747:     after 
  748: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  749:     end,
  750: 
  751:     LastData = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  752:     ok = ssh_sftp:pwrite(Sftp, Handle, eof, LastData),
  753: 
  754:     NewData1 = unicode:characters_to_binary("Bye, see you tomorrow" ++ LastData),
  755:     {ok, NewData1} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  756: 
  757: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  758: start_channel_sock(Config) ->
  759:     LoginOpts =
  760: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config) of
  761: 	    erlang_server -> 
  762: 		[{user,     proplists:get_value(user, Config)},
  763: 		 {password, proplists:get_value(passwd, Config)}];
  764: 	    openssh_server ->
  765: 		[] % Use public key
  766: 	end,
  767: 
  768:     Opts = [{user_interaction, false},
  769: 	    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  770:             {save_accepted_host, false}
  771: 	    | LoginOpts],
  772: 
  773:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  774: 
  775:     %% Get a tcp socket
  776:     {ok, Sock} = ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host, Port, [{active,false}]),
  777: 
  778:     %% and open one channel on one new Connection
  779:     {ok, ChPid1, Conn} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Sock, Opts),
  780:     
  781:     %% Test that the channel is usable
  782:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  783:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  784: 
  785:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  786:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [write]),
  787: 
  788:     %% Try to open a second channel on the Connection
  789:     {ok, ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  790:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  791:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [read]),
  792: 
  793:     %% Test that the second channel still works after closing the first one
  794:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid1),
  795:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  796:     
  797:     %% Test the Connection survives that all channels are closed
  798:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid2),
  799:     {ok, ChPid3} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  800:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid3, SftpFileName, [write]),
  801:     
  802:     %% Test that a closed channel really is closed
  803:     {error, closed} = ssh_sftp:open(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  804:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid3),
  805: 
  806:     %% Test that the socket is closed when the Connection closes
  807:     ok = ssh:close(Conn),
  808:     timer:sleep(400), %% Until the stop sequence is fixed
  809:     {error,_} = inet:getopts(Sock, [active]),
  810: 
  811:     ok.
  812: 
  813: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  814: sftp_nonexistent_subsystem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  815:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  816:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  817:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  818:     {error,"server failed to start sftp subsystem"} =
  819: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  820: 			       [{user_interaction, false},
  821: 				{user, User},
  822: 				{password, Passwd},
  823: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  824:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  825:                                ]).
  826: 
  827: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  828: version_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  829:     open_close_dir(Config).
  830: 
  831: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  832: create_empty_tar(Config) ->
  833:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  834:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  835:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  836:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  837:     erl_tar:close(Handle),
  838:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
  839:     {ok, #file_info{type=regular}} =
  840: 	ssh_sftp:read_file_info(ChPid, SftpTarFileName).
  841: 
  842: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  843: files_to_tar(Config) ->
  844:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  845:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  846:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  847:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  848:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  849:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose]),
  850:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  851:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  852:     chk_tar([F1, "f2.txt"], Config).
  853: 
  854: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  855: ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  856:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  857:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  858:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  859:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  860:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  861:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  862:     chk_tar(["f2.txt"], Config).
  863: 
  864: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  865: ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  866:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F3_txt, Config) of
  867: 	undefined ->
  868: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  869: 	Fn ->
  870: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  871: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  872:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  873: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  874: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  875: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  876: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  877:     end.
  878: 
  879: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  880: unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  881:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F4_txt, Config) of
  882: 	undefined ->
  883: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  884: 	Fn ->
  885: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  886: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  887:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  888: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  889: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  890: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  891: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  892:     end.
  893: 
  894: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  895: big_file_to_tar(Config) ->
  896:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  897:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  898:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  899:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]), 
  900:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose]),
  901:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  902:     chk_tar(["big.txt"], Config).
  903: 
  904: 
  905: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  906: files_chunked_to_tar(Config) ->
  907:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  908:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  909:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  910:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  911:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  912:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  913:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  914:     chk_tar([F1], Config).
  915: 
  916: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  917: directory_to_tar(Config) ->
  918:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  919:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  920:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  921:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  922:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("d1",Config), "d1", [verbose]),
  923:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  924:     chk_tar(["d1"], Config).
  925: 
  926: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  927: binaries_to_tar(Config) ->
  928:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  929:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  930:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  931:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  932:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  933:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  934:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  935:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}], Config).
  936: 
  937: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  938: null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
  939:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  940:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
  941:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  942:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
  943:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  944:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  945:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  946:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  947:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  948:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  949:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  950:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  951:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
  952:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  953:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config).
  954: 
  955: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  956: simple_crypto_tar_small(Config) ->
  957:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  958:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _Size=6} end,
  959:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  960:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_Size=4} end,
  961:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
  962:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  963:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  964:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  965:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  966:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  967:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  968:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  969:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  970:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  971:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
  972: 
  973: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  974: simple_crypto_tar_big(Config) ->
  975:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  976:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=6} end,
  977:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  978:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=4} end,
  979:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
  980:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  981:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  982:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  983:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  984:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  985:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  986:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  987:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  988:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
  989:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  990:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
  991: 
  992: stuff(Bin) -> << <<C,C>> || <<C>> <= Bin >>.
  993: 
  994: unstuff(Bin) -> << <<C>> || <<C,C>> <= Bin >>.
  995: 
  996: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  997: read_tar(Config) ->
  998:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  999:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1000: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1001: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1002: 		 ]),
 1003:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1004:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1005:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
 1006:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1007:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1008:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1009: 
 1010:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config).
 1011: 
 1012: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1013: read_null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
 1014:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1015:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1016: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1017: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1018: 		 ]),
 1019:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
 1020:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
 1021:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
 1022:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_FetchSize=19} end,
 1023:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
 1024:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1025:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1026: 
 1027:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1028:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1029:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1030:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1031:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1032:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1033: 
 1034:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1035: 
 1036: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1037: read_crypto_tar(Config) ->
 1038:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1039:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1040: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1041: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1042: 		 ]),
 1043:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
 1044:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
 1045: 
 1046:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
 1047:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_FetchSize=120} end,
 1048:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
 1049:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1050:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1051: 
 1052:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1053:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1054:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1055:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1056:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1057:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1058: 
 1059:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1060: 
 1061: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1062: block_size_16_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_cbc, Config).
 1063: block_size_1_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_ctr, Config).
 1064: 
 1065: cipher_crypto_tar(Cipher, Config) ->
 1066:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1067:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1068: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1069: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))},
 1070: 		  {"d1",fn("d1",Config)}  % Dir
 1071: 		 ]),
 1072:     Key = <<"This is a 256 bit key. Boring...">>,
 1073:     Ivec0 = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(16),
 1074: 
 1075:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,[{encrypt,true},
 1076:                                                                 {padding,zero}])} end,
 1077:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,false)} end,
 1078: 
 1079:     Cenc = fun(PlainBin,State) -> 
 1080: 		   CipherBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1081: 		   {ok, CipherBin, State}
 1082: 	   end,
 1083:     Cdec = fun(CipherBin,State) ->
 1084: 		   PlainBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, CipherBin),
 1085: 		   {ok, PlainBin, State}
 1086: 	   end,
 1087: 
 1088:     Cendw = fun(PlainBin, State) ->
 1089:                     CipherBin1 = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1090:                     Sz1 = size(CipherBin1),
 1091: 		    CipherBin2 = crypto:crypto_final(State),
 1092:                     Sz2 = size(CipherBin2),
 1093: 		    {ok, <<CipherBin1:Sz1/binary, CipherBin2:Sz2/binary>>}
 1094: 	    end,
 1095: 
 1096:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1097:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1098:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1099: 
 1100:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1101:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose]) || {Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1102:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1103: 
 1104:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1105:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1106: 
 1107: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1108: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1110: have_unicode_support() -> (file:native_name_encoding() == utf8) andalso ("四" == [22235]).
 1111: 
 1112: 
 1113: make_data_sub_dir(Config, SubDirSrc, SubDirDst) ->
 1114:     SrcDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1115:                            SubDirSrc
 1116:                           ),
 1117:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1118:                            SubDirDst),
 1119:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1120:     {ok,DstDir}.
 1121:     
 1122: 
 1123: prepare(Config0) ->
 1124:     SrcDir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar,Config0),
 1125:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config0), ssh_test_lib:random_chars(10)),
 1126:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1127:     Keys = [filename,
 1128: 	    testfile,
 1129: 	    linktest,
 1130: 	    tar_filename],
 1131:     Config1 = foldl_keydelete(Keys, Config0),
 1132:     Config2 = lists:foldl(fun({Key,Name}, ConfAcc) ->
 1133:                                   [{Key, filename:join(DstDir,Name)} | ConfAcc]
 1134: 			  end,
 1135: 			  Config1,
 1136:                           lists:zip(Keys, [proplists:get_value(K,Config0) || K<-Keys])),
 1137: 
 1138:     catch ct:log("~p:~p Prepared filenames (Key -> Value):~n~ts",
 1139:                  [?MODULE,?LINE,
 1140:                   [io_lib:format("~p -> ~ts~n", [K,V]) || {K,V} <- Config2,
 1141:                                                           lists:member(K, Keys)]]),
 1142: 
 1143:     DataDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config2),
 1144:     FilenameSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "sftp.txt"),
 1145:     FilenameDst = proplists:get_value(filename, Config2),
 1146:     {ok,_} = file:copy(FilenameSrc, FilenameDst),
 1147:     [{sftp_priv_dir,DstDir} | Config2].
 1148: 
 1149: 
 1150: foldl_keydelete(Keys, L) ->
 1151:     lists:foldl(fun(K,E) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,E) end, 
 1152: 		L,
 1153: 		Keys).
 1154: 
 1155: 
 1156: chk_tar(Items, Config) ->
 1157:     chk_tar(Items, Config, []).
 1158: 
 1159: chk_tar(Items, Config, Opts) ->
 1160:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1161:     chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts).
 1162: 
 1163: chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts)  when is_list(Opts) ->
 1164:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1165:     tar_size(TarFileName, Config),
 1166:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1167:     {ok,HandleRead} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid, SftpTarFileName, [read|Opts]),
 1168:     {ok,NameValueList} = erl_tar:extract(HandleRead,[memory,verbose]),
 1169:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleRead),
 1170:     case {lists:sort(expand_items(Items,Config)), lists:sort(NameValueList)} of
 1171: 	{L,L} -> 
 1172: 	    true;
 1173: 	{Expect,Actual} -> 
 1174: 	    ct:log("Expect: ~p",[Expect]), ct:log("Actual: ~p",[Actual]),
 1175: 	    case erl_tar:table(TarFileName) of
 1176: 		{ok,Names} -> ct:log("names: ~p",[Names]);
 1177: 		Other -> ct:log("~p",[Other])
 1178: 	    end,
 1179: 	    ct:log("~s",[analyze_report(Expect, Actual)]),
 1180: 	    ct:fail(bad_tar_contents)
 1181:     end.
 1182: 
 1183: analyze_report([E={NameE,BinE}|Es], [A={NameA,BinA}|As]) ->
 1184:     if
 1185: 	NameE == NameA,
 1186: 	BinE =/= BinA-> 
 1187: 	    [["Component ",NameE," differs. \n  Expected: ",BinE,"\n  Actual: ",BinA,"\n\n"]
 1188: 	     | analyze_report(Es,As)];
 1189: 
 1190: 	NameE < NameA ->
 1191: 	    [["Component ",NameE," is missing.\n\n"]
 1192: 	     | analyze_report(Es,[A|As])];
 1193: 
 1194: 	NameE > NameA ->
 1195: 	    [["Component ",NameA," is not expected.\n\n"]
 1196: 	     | analyze_report([E|Es],As)];
 1197: 	true ->
 1198: 	    analyze_report(Es, As)
 1199:     end;
 1200: analyze_report([{NameE,_BinE}|Es], []) ->
 1201:     [["Component ",NameE," missing.\n\n"] | analyze_report(Es,[])];
 1202: analyze_report([], [{NameA,_BinA}|As]) ->
 1203:     [["Component ",NameA," not expected.\n\n"] | analyze_report([],As)];
 1204: analyze_report([], []) ->
 1205:     "".
 1206: 
 1207: tar_size(TarFileName, Config) ->
 1208:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1209:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1210:     {ok,Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(ChPid, SftpTarFileName),
 1211:     io:format('Tar file ~p is~n ~p bytes.~n',[TarFileName, size(Data)]).
 1212: 
 1213: expand_items(Items, Config) ->    
 1214:     lists:flatten(
 1215:       [case Item of
 1216: 	   {_Name,Bin} when is_binary(Bin) -> 
 1217: 	       Item;
 1218: 	   {Name,FileName} when is_list(FileName) ->
 1219: 	       read_item_contents(Name, fn(FileName,Config));
 1220: 	   FileName  when is_list(FileName) ->
 1221: 	       read_item_contents(FileName, fn(FileName,Config))
 1222:        end || Item <- Items]).
 1223: 
 1224: read_item_contents(ItemName, FileName) ->
 1225:     case file:read_file(FileName) of
 1226: 	{ok,Bin} ->
 1227: 	    {ItemName, Bin};
 1228: 	{error,eisdir} ->
 1229: 	    {ok,FileNames} = file:list_dir(FileName),
 1230: 	    [read_item_contents(filename:join(ItemName,Name),
 1231: 				filename:join(FileName,Name)) 
 1232: 	     || Name<-FileNames]
 1233:     end.
 1234: 
 1235: fn(Name, Config) ->
 1236:     Dir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar, Config),
 1237:     filename:join(Dir,Name).
 1238: 
 1239: fmt_host({A,B,C,D}) -> lists:concat([A,".",B,".",C,".",D]);
 1240: fmt_host(S) -> S.
 1241: 
 1242: 
 1243: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1244: populate_non_unicode(Dir) ->
 1245:     file:delete("f1.txt"),
 1246:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"f3.txt"),
 1247:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1248:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"F一.txt"),
 1249:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1250:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"g四.txt"),
 1251:                          <<"How are you?">>).
 1252: 
 1253: w2l(P) ->
 1254:     ssh_test_lib:winpath_to_linuxpath(P).
 1255: 
 1256: w2l(Config, P) ->
 1257:     W2L = proplists:get_value(w2l, Config, fun(X) -> X end),
 1258:     W2L(P).
 1259: 
 1260:
